name: Loppy: Planet Hopper
description:
- [ DEMO AVAILABLE! ] -

Join Loppy, and her friends, on an out-of-this-world 2D platforming adventure where you'll travel to various themed planets, run through levels, jump over obstacles, stomp and punch evil businessmen, find ingredients, discover secrets, and save the galaxy (also your own bakery), from the clutches of an evil corporation.

~ OVERVIEW ~

Loppy: Planet Hopper is a 2D platformer with a 16-bit in-game art style that takes inspiration from many classic 2D platformers from the '90s.

The game takes place in a far-off solar system, named the "Polarian Solar System", inhabited by unique-looking aliens, who live in various themed planets (city planet, beach planet, prehistoric planet, etc).

The story revolves around a group of aliens, named Loppy, Evlie, Myah, and Studart, all of which work at a small bakery in "Polaris" (city planet), happily named the "GoGo Bakery".

All of the sudden, their work is threatened when Rang Tang, an evil corporation bent on taking over various independent businesses (and the entire universe), sends them a letter obliging them to fork over the bakery.

Not wanting to give up their love for baking, the aliens decide to fight their way to Rang Tang's headquarters, even if it'll cost them a life to do so.

~ FEATURES ~ 4 PLAYABLE CHARACTERS to choose from, each with unique abilities! 

Jump, Smash, Boost or Glide your way to victory!

Gather INGREDIENTS to gain powers!

During a level, you might come across certain ingredients, grab them and use them in the world map's inventory screen to create powered pastries that will help you beat levels easily and also find secrets!

Up to 3 PLAYERS can join in for the best MULTIPLAYER experience! 

Help Loppy & Co. gather collectibles like coins and ingredients, place Holographic Blocks to get to hard-to-reach areas, or use Holographic Bombs to defeat enemies! (or... if you're feeling mischievous, use them to prank the main player!)

~ CAST OF CHARACTERS ~
FULL NAME - Loppy Lazuli

IN-GAME STATS - High Jump, Fastest Speed.

SPECIAL MOVE - Ball Roll, lets Loppy transform into a ball and roll!

AGE - 76 Alien Years (19 Human Years)

SPECIES - Cyclopida IlusLoppy is a cheery, outgoing, but yet clumsy alien that will find joy in the simplest of things.

The two things Loppy loves the most are baking and her loved ones, having sworn to protect and care for them, which is how she got the position of leader of the GoGo baker trio in the first place.FULL NAME - Evlie Saltazar

IN-GAME STATS - Low Jump, Lowest Speed.

SPECIAL MOVE - Bull Dash, lets Evlie travel at high speeds while knocking out enemies and boxes that come in her way, but make sure not to hit a wall!

AGE - 84 Alien Years (21 Human Years)

SPECIES - Crustatia GigantasEvlie is pretty relaxed but somewhat dim-witted at the same time. She's known for cracking (bad) jokes and pulling inoffensive pranks on her friends.

She uses her hefty hands to lift heavy-weighted stuff, and also to knead bread. As for her horns, she mostly uses them to hang stuff, still doesn't stop her from using them to defend herself though!

FULL NAME - Myah Cohren

IN-GAME STATS - Low Jump, Fastest Speed.

SPECIAL MOVE - Jump Boost, gives Myah a vertical boost that will let her reach high places!

AGE - 72 Alien Years (18 Human Years)

SPECIES - Gastropoda StiktusMyah isn't really the most extroverted and brave alien on the planet, she's pretty much known for using her booster chair to avoid any problematic situation that could arise. But... despite the odds, she's gotten pretty positive reviews about her attentiveness, good memory, quick service, and just overall being a good waitress.FULL NAME - Studart Harriz

IN-GAME STATS - High Jump, Lowest Speed.

SPECIAL MOVE - Mop Twirl, lets Studart spin his mop in place, and spawn bubbles that will surely spook some enemies once they pop!

AGE - 68 Alien Years (17 Human Years)

SPECIES - Impia MytisHe might look harmless, but Studart knows how to defend himself pretty well, using his mop as a self-defense tool whenever danger comes through.

Although he works at the bakery, he finds more enjoyment being a janitor than being a baker, Studart is also very talkative and likes to name his possessions, like his ship, "Margerita", and his mop, "Oswall".


FULL NAMES - Mishell Rubots, Trebor Davor, Ane Mardo, Julus Bomes

ABILITIES - Spawn Holographic Blocks and Bombs.

SPECIES - Impia Multus.The M.F.O.'s (Multiple Flying Objects) come in peace and are in desperate need to finish their school report on different alien cultures, thankfully, they've come across Polaris and decided to base their report on the GoGo Bakery team!

They will assist Loppy & Co. in Multiplayer!

FULL NAME - Magnush McBiggFiss

AGE - 180 Alien Years (45 Human Years)

SPECIES - GuardonisBeing the C.E.O. of a company that wishes to conquer various galaxies is no easy task! And to do that, you just gotta be an intimidating pushover, and that is exactly what Magnush is!

He is the main villain of the game.
~ PLEASE NOTE! ~

Files labeled as (Windows) contain game files meant to work with Windows computers, and files labeled as (Other OS) contain files meant to work on every other OS (Including Windows) using the LÖVE executable.

HUGE thanks to Edward K. Stuart for providing the music!

I hope you enjoy the game as much as I enjoyed making it!

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Also available on VoxPop Games Store with Made for VoxPop exclusive content, including exclusive power-ups and a brand new planet to explore! (Once the game comes out, that is)
